heading: mtv does mp3
subheading: soon teenyboppers will have a taste of mp3, as mtv and the makers of the rio strike a deal to bring digital music to the masses. by lindsey arent.
author: lindsey arent
text: with the ink just dry on a deal with diamond multimedia, makers of the rio mp3 music player, mtv networks online has entered the digital music fray. read wired news' ongoing mp3 coverage
